Class AbstractCommunicationModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • kernel.AbstractCommunicationModel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CommunicationModel
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ChannelCommunicationModel, StandardCommunicationModel

    public abstract class AbstractCommunicationModel
extends java.lang.Object
implements CommunicationModel
    Abstract base class for communication models.
